item.title: How to use AWS KMS RSA keys for offline encryption
item.description:
October 28, 2022: This blog post has been updated to reflect that CBC has changed to CTR, as well as a few more modifications. This blog post discusses how you can use AWS Key Management Service (AWS KMS) RSA public keys on end clients or devices and encrypt data, then subsequently decrypt data by using [â€¦]

October 28, 2022: This blog post has been updated to reflect that CBC has changed to CTR, as well as a few more modifications.
